title: Interoperable
description: Build using an enterprise SDK of your choice. Available credential types include JSON (VC-JWT), JSON-LD, AnonCreds, with more options coming soon.

title: Zero-Knowledge
description: Zero-knowledge proof (ZKP) credentials for enhanced privacy. Seamlessly integrate advanced security measures to protect user data.

title: Tax Compliance
description: We stay up to date on the latest changes to the tax code.
